entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @FredTJoseph @Zelle @CashApp @PayPal I am a nursing Assistant and My kids and I are on a 2 week quarantine due to my kids being around a family that tested positive for the Coronavirus. The money that I had went to rent and now I’m have nothing. I need help me with food. Please. Paypal: Kendra.n.amory@gmail.com https://t.co/L2uovY6Smf
